messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Signs
messages.msgSnippet: Oh Deb!!  LOL!! Kelli Deborah Lewis  wrote:Dylan was watching Signs tonight and if you ve seen it you know how funny it is. So, they find
messages.messageBody:
Oh Deb!! LOL!!

Kelli


Deborah Lewis <ddzimlew@...> wrote:Dylan was watching "Signs" tonight and if you've seen it you know how
funny it is.
So, they find the crop circles and he's fine. And they see someone
hanging around the house at night and he's fine. Then the news
broadcast says that it's aliens... things are spooky and Dylan is
talking to the TV, "CUT THE CORN! " "CUT THE CORN" Mel Gibson KNOWS
there are aliens in his field and Dylan says "GET ON THE COMBINE AND CUT
THE CORN."

Wouldn't have been much of a story I guess if they'd just cut the corn.

Deb L, mother of a smart kid <g>

messages.subject: Signs
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/15/03 2:55:22 AM Central Standard Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/15/03 2:55:22 AM Central Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

<<
The only moment that really creeped me was the fingers under the pantry
door. >>

I can't get that visual out of my head!! Creepy.
We finally watched it last week and Jared won't go to the bathroom alone now.
He's mad that I let him watch it...:) Poor guy.
I didn't know it would creep him out so bad, he's seen much worse. But it WAS
very spine tingling kind of scary.
We kept wondering WHY didn't they go to the lake?
'Course the movie would have been over in that case too.
Cut the corn or go to the lake..DUH

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Signs
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/14/03 10:03:20 PM, ddzimlew@juno.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/14/03 10:03:20 PM, ddzimlew@... writes:

<< Then the news
broadcast says that it's aliens... things are spooky and Dylan is
talking to the TV, "CUT THE CORN! " "CUT THE CORN" Mel Gibson KNOWS
there are aliens in his field and Dylan says "GET ON THE COMBINE AND CUT
THE CORN." >>

That is so cool.

I just saw it a few weeks ago with Marty, who had seen it in the theater and
wanted to watch it with me. But we're desert rats and have never known
anyone who owned a combine! Here, people tend to pick corn by hand and then
just plow the dried-up stalks up in the spring.

<<Deb L, mother of a smart kid>>

Yes you are. <g>

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Signs
messages.msgSnippet: The only moment that really creeped me was the fingers under the pantry door. I loved that movie. Did you give Cameron a glass of water on his nightstand?
messages.messageBody:
The only moment that really creeped me was the fingers under the pantry
door.
I loved that movie.

Did you give Cameron a glass of water on his nightstand?<g>

Deb L

ddzimlew@... writes:

> Dylan was watching "Signs" tonight and if you've seen it you know how
> funny it is.
> So, they find the crop circles and he's fine. And they see someone

>

Cameron won't leave the TV off at night because of "Signs": he just lets the
one in his room stay on with no sound so he doesn't have to see the face of
some alien on it when he wakes! <G>

~Kelly

messages.subject: Signs
messages.msgSnippet: Dylan was watching Signs tonight and if you ve seen it you know how funny it is. So, they find the crop circles and he s fine. And they see someone hanging
messages.messageBody:
Dylan was watching "Signs" tonight and if you've seen it you know how
funny it is.
So, they find the crop circles and he's fine. And they see someone
hanging around the house at night and he's fine. Then the news
broadcast says that it's aliens... things are spooky and Dylan is
talking to the TV, "CUT THE CORN! " "CUT THE CORN" Mel Gibson KNOWS
there are aliens in his field and Dylan says "GET ON THE COMBINE AND CUT
THE CORN."

Wouldn't have been much of a story I guess if they'd just cut the corn.

Deb L, mother of a smart kid <g>
